commands.description: remove the process type from your app
commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku container:rm [34m[flags][39m

[1mremove the process type from your app[22m

[34mFlags:[39m
 -a, --app APP        [2mapp to run command against[22m
 -r, --remote REMOTE  [2mgit remote of app to use[22m

[1m[4m[35mUsage:[39m[24m[22m
    [36m[1mheroku container:rm web[22m[39m        # Destroys the web container
    [36m[1mheroku container:rm web worker[22m[39m # Destroys the web and worker containers
helpLine: [2mremove the process type from your app[22m

commands.description: Use containers to build and deploy Heroku apps
commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku container

[1mUse containers to build and deploy Heroku apps[22m
helpLine: [2mUse containers to build and deploy Heroku apps[22m

commands.description: log in to Heroku Container Registry
commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku container:login [34m[flags][39m

[1mlog in to Heroku Container Registry[22m

[34mFlags:[39m
 -v, --verbose

Usage:
        heroku container:login

commands.description: log out from Heroku Container Registry
commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku container:logout [34m[flags][39m

[1mlog out from Heroku Container Registry[22m

[34mFlags:[39m
 -v, --verbose

commands.description: builds, then pushes Docker images to deploy your Heroku app
commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku container:push [34m[flags][39m

[1mbuilds, then pushes Docker images to deploy your Heroku app[22m

[34mFlags:[39m
 -R, --recursive      [2mpushes Dockerfile.<process> found in current and subdirectories[22m
 -a, --app APP        [2mapp to run command against[22m
 -r, --remote REMOTE  [2mgit remote of app to use[22m
 -v, --verbose
 --arg ARG            [2mset build-time variables[22m

[1m[4m[35mUsage:[39m[24m[22m
    [36m[1mheroku container:push web[22m[39m                          # Pushes Dockerfile to web process type
    [36m[1mheroku container:push worker[22m[39m                       # Pushes Dockerfile to worker process type
    [36m[1mheroku container:push web worker --recursive[22m[39m       # Pushes Dockerfile.web and Dockerfile.worker
    [36m[1mheroku container:push --recursive[22m[39m                  # Pushes Dockerfile.*
    [36m[1mheroku container:push web --arg ENV=live,HTTPS=on[22m[39m  # Build-time variables
helpLine: [2mbuilds, then pushes Docker images to deploy your Heroku app[22m

commands.description: builds, then runs the docker image locally
commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku container:run [34m[flags][39m

[1mbuilds, then runs the docker image locally[22m

[34mFlags:[39m
 -a, --app APP        [2mapp to run command against[22m
 -p, --port PORT      [2mport the app will run on[22m
 -r, --remote REMOTE  [2mgit remote of app to use[22m
 -v, --verbose

[1m[4m[35mUsage:[39m[24m[22m
    [36m[1mheroku container:run web bash[22m[39m # Runs bash on the local web docker container
    [36m[1mheroku container:run worker[22m[39m   # Runs the container CMD on the local worker container
helpLine: [2mbuilds, then runs the docker image locally[22m

topics.description: Use containers to build and deploy Heroku apps
topics.name: container
topics.help: Use containers to build and deploy Heroku apps
